name: General Document
description: Template for general purpose document extraction - flexible for any document type
system_prompt: You are a document analysis assistant. Extract structured data from documents accurately and comprehensively.
user_prompt_template:
Extract information from this document as valid JSON.

IMPORTANT RULES:
1. Use null for any information you cannot find
2. Be precise - only extract what is explicitly stated
3. Do not make assumptions or infer information
4. Return ONLY valid JSON, no explanations, no markdown

Extract these variables:
{variables_list}

Document excerpt:
---
{text}
---

Respond with ONLY a JSON object following this exact schema:
{json_schema}

variables.name: title
variables.description: Title or subject of the document

variables.name: author
variables.description: Author or creator of the document

variables.name: summary
variables.description: Brief summary of the document content

variables.name: key_points
variables.description: Main points or findings in the document

output_format.null_handling: Use null for missing data (not 'N/A' or empty string)
